description: AgentKit core hooks: markdown formatting, smart suggestions, and quality gate

hooks.prompt: After completing this tool use, briefly consider: Are there any AgentKit skills that would be helpful as a next step? Only suggest if genuinely relevant to what just happened. Do not suggest if the user is mid-workflow or if no skill clearly applies. If suggesting, mention the skill name naturally in your response (e.g., 'You might want to run /ak-security:secure for a security check').

Before finishing, perform a quick quality check: (1) Did you complete all requested tasks? (2) Are there failing tests or lint errors from changes you made? (3) Did you leave any TODO/FIXME comments that need attention? If any issues are found, mention them briefly. Do not run additional commands unless critical issues are discovered.
